data.what_is:
Peach is a WhatsApp marketing automation software designed to help businesses grow their revenue on WhatsApp. With Peach, businesses can automate customer interactions, send beautiful campaigns and track conversions. Build and launch engaging bot experiences on WhatsApp. Tailored for enterprises and growing businesses alike, Peach streamlines your marketing journey. Take control of repetitive tasks, launch targeted drip campaigns, interactive initiatives, and broadcasts that resonate with logically segmented audiences. Real-time campaign analytics empower you to analyse performance on the fly, allowing you to re-engage your audience effectively and boost conversion rates. 

If you are tired of omni channel marketing, repetitive tasks and minimal ROI, Peach is the perfect solution for you. Add multiple WhatsApp numbers, monitor click through rates, employ smart agent assignment, schedule campaigns and customise your dashboard to achieve your conversion goals.
data.product_description:
Peach is a WhatsApp marketing automation software designed to help businesses grow their revenue on WhatsApp. With Peach, businesses can automate customer interactions, send beautiful campaigns and track conversions. Build and launch engaging bot experiences on WhatsApp. Tailored for enterprises and growing businesses alike, Peach streamlines your marketing journey. Take control of repetitive tasks, launch targeted drip campaigns, interactive initiatives, and broadcasts that resonate with logically segmented audiences. Real-time campaign analytics empower you to analyse performance on the fly, allowing you to re-engage your audience effectively and boost conversion rates. 

If you are tired of omni channel marketing, repetitive tasks and minimal ROI, Peach is the perfect solution for you. Add multiple WhatsApp numbers, monitor click through rates, employ smart agent assignment, schedule campaigns and customise your dashboard to achieve your conversion goals.

initial_reviews.review_title: Simple yet Powerful Marketing Automation Tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Peach?
The features like running automation campaigns seamlessly and creating WhatsApp newsletters help my business to grow effortlessly. Besides, since I started using it, customer acquisition is never a roadblock for me.

What do you dislike about Peach?
This powerful tool can have more features. However, the restricted number of features in the tool makes me look for alternative tools for tracking the campaigns and report generation.

What problems is Peach solving and how is that benefiting you?
It solves - Audience reach, Customer Engagement, Customer Acquisition and Retention. The in-built features elevate the marketing automation experience and help me scale up my business quickly.

initial_reviews.review_title: Peach Connect is a perfect connect
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Peach?
Good Ad distribution in video format to target audience with normal or campaigns with easy setup and very less time.

What do you dislike about Peach?
As of now no issues or disadvantages of product.

What problems is Peach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation is key of this platform and also with video ad's features it attracts more users.
